document.heading: Youth Services Coordination Task Force Emergency Amendment Act of 2016

To amend, on an emergency basis, the Fiscal Year 2017 Budget Support Act of 2016 to extend the deadline for the submission of a report by the Youth Services Coordination Task Force and the sunset date from March 1, 2017, to October 1, 2017.
document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Youth Services Coordination Task Force Emergency Amendment Act of 2016".

section.text: The Fiscal Year 2017 Budget Support Act of 2016, effective October 8, 2016 (D.C. Law 21-160; 63 DCR 10775), is amended as follows:

para.text: Section 5092(e) is amended by striking the date "March 17" and inserting the date "October 1" in its place.
Section 5094 is amended by striking the date "March 17" and inserting the date "October 1" in its place.

codify:emergency.action: amendment to the Expansion and Coordination of Youth Services Act of 2016

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement of the Budget Director as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code ยง 1-301.47a).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto), and shall remain in effect for no longer than 90 days, as provided for emergency acts of the Council of the District of Columbia in section 412(a) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 788; D.C. Official Code ยง 1-204.12(a)).
